workflow.name: Qualify & auto-reply to leads with OpenAI, Airtable, and Gmail
workflow.description:
## üß† How it works
This workflow turns your website form into a fully automated AI Lead Qualification system.  
Whenever a new lead submits your form, the workflow:

1. Receives the submission through a Webhook  
2. Cleans and normalizes the input fields  
3. Uses the AI Agent node to score and qualify the lead  
4. Saves all details (including AI analysis) into an Airtable CRM  
5. Automatically routes high-quality leads (score ‚â• 7)  
6. Sends an instant Gmail notification  
7. Sends an AI-generated personalized auto-reply back to the lead  

This gives you a hands-free, intelligent front-door to your business ‚Äî ensuring you only spend time on high-value opportunities.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Set-up steps
These steps help users configure the workflow quickly:

1. **Create a Webhook trigger**  
   ‚Äì Copy the webhook URL and add it to your form tool (Tally, Typeform, Webflow, etc.).

2. **Prepare your Airtable base**  
   ‚Äì Create a "Leads" table with fields for name, email, website, message, lead score, priority, use case, timeline, budget, and AI notes.

3. **Add the AI Agent node**  
   ‚Äì Insert the provided System + User prompts  
   ‚Äì Enable Structured Output  
   ‚Äì Paste the JSON Schema included in the sticky note inside the workflow.

4. **Connect Airtable**  
   ‚Äì Map the original form fields + AI Agent ‚Äúoutput‚Äù fields to Airtable columns.

5. **Set up the Gmail node**  
   ‚Äì Connect your Gmail account  
   ‚Äì Configure the notification email and auto-reply templates.

6. **Configure the IF node**  
   ‚Äì Score ‚â• 7 routes to the ‚ÄúHot Lead‚Äù branch  
   ‚Äì Everything else is captured but not routed.

7. **Run a test submission**  
   ‚Äì Verify that the workflow writes to Airtable  
   ‚Äì Confirm the Gmail notification + auto-reply are delivered  
   ‚Äì Adjust prompting if needed.

All detailed explanations and prompt configurations are included inside the workflow through sticky notes for easy reference.

workflow.name: AI Lead Qualifier & Auto Draft Reply AI Agent

values.fieldLabel: What do you need help with ?

parameters.formDescription: Work with Us to get more work done.

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert Lead Qualification AI for an automation & AI services agency.

Your role:
- Analyze incoming leads
- Extract structured data
- Infer missing details when needed
- Ensure all values match the JSON Schema provided to you

Rules:
- Follow the JSON Schema EXACTLY.
- Do NOT add extra fields.
- Do NOT output text outside the JSON.
- Do NOT include explanations, markdown, or backticks.
- If information is vague, make a reasonable inference.
- Assign lead priority based on lead_score:
  - High: score 7‚Äì10
  - Medium: score 4‚Äì6
  - Low: score 1‚Äì3
- Timeline MUST be one of: "ASAP", "1-3 months", "3-6 months", "Just exploring".

Your ONLY job is to fill the required fields with the best possible values based on the user-provided lead data.

The Agent tool will wrap your JSON inside an "output" object automatically. You MUST only return the JSON that matches the schema.

value.Name: ={{ $('On form submission').item.json.Name }}
value.Raw Message: ={{ $('On form submission').item.json['What do you need help with ?'] }}

parameters.content:
## 1. Capture the leads form the Form 

For each new lead, the workflow starts when someone submits your website form ‚Äî their details arrive instantly through a webhook. Before sending anything to the AI, the workflow cleans and normalizes the fields so the model clearly understands the name, email, website, and message. The AI then evaluates the inquiry and returns structured insights like lead score, priority, business type, budget, timeline, and a short sales-ready summary. Finally, everything is saved neatly into your Airtable CRM so the team can review, track, and follow up without missing important context.

## 2. Qualify a Lead

Check if lead is high quality >= 7 score

## Send Notification ?? (Optional)

Sending a notification to WhatsApp , Slack , order any other channel is alos possible with new functionality.

## 3. Send Email To Team 

This node notifies when a High quality lead as come through.

parameters.subject: =üî• New High-Priority Lead ({{ $('AI Agent').item.json.output.lead_score }}/10) ‚Äì {{ $('On form submission').item.json.Name }}

messageValues.message:
You are an automation & AI consultant. You write concise, friendly emails to new leads, based on their inquiry.
Your goal is to:
- Acknowledge their situation
- Briefly explain how you can help
- Ask 2‚Äì3 focused questions to clarify scope
- Offer a link to book a call
Keep it under 180 words. Tone: friendly, clear, and professional.
Return only the email body text, no greetings metadata, no JSON.
Always sign off with Growth Rise Agency

parameters.content:
## 4 . Draft a Reply Email AI Agent

When a new high proioty lead comes we generate a AI-generated reply.  The draft is a   a clear, context-aware response. The draft is then sent to Gmail‚Äôs Create Draft node, so you can review, edit, and send it manually ‚Äî giving you speed without losing control.

# üß† **How This Lead Qualifier + Draft Reply Agent Works**

1. **Form Submission**
   A lead fills your website form with their details and project information.

2. **Webhook Trigger**
   The form sends data into this workflow instantly through a webhook.

3. **Clean & Normalize Data**
   We extract and format the fields (name, email, website, message, etc.) so the AI can understand them clearly.

4. **AI Lead Qualification**
   The AI analyzes the lead‚Äôs message and returns structured data:

   * Lead Score (1‚Äì10)
   * Priority (High / Medium / Low)
   * Business Type
   * Use Case Summary
   * Budget (estimated)
   * Timeline
   * AI Notes for Sales

5. **Save to Airtable CRM**
   The full lead + AI insights are stored inside Airtable for tracking and follow-up.

6. **Hot Lead Routing**
   If the lead is high quality (score ‚â• 7), the workflow triggers:

   * Instant email alert to you
   * Auto-reply sent to the lead

7. **Low-Priority Leads**
   Lower-score leads are still saved but not routed, so you only focus on high-value opportunities.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
